comments.body: Curious to know why do we need this call here?
we need to run "skip" to disable page display mode.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +367,371 @@
    result = {'changed': False}
    exec_command(module, 'skip')
    want = map_params_to_obj(module)
    have = map_config_to_obj(module)

comments.body:
Add a notes section for icx version tested against and link to platform guide
In the notes section, you can point to the icx platform guide https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/devel/docs/docsite/rst/network/user_guide/platform_icx.rst

Refer: https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/devel/lib/ansible/modules/network/junos/junos_interfaces.py#L107
Applicable for other icx modules as well.
